key_risks: Regulatory and legal challenges impacting competitive positioning and revenue streams
Significant increase in consumer complaints affecting customer retention and brand reputation
Data privacy and security concerns due to potential data breaches
Intense competition from rivals pressuring market share and profitability
controversies: Legal disputes over wholesale internet access rules
Employment-related complaint in Los Angeles County
Supreme Court ruling on consumer protection laws leading to reputational risks
Investigation into data breach involving employee information and company source code
environmental_issues: Commitment to reducing carbon footprint and sustainability initiatives
social_issues: Rising consumer complaints and service quality issues
governance_issues: Cybersecurity vulnerabilities and data protection protocols
